paper_abstract: Due to integrated positive features of both hypercubes and tori, optical multi-mesh hypercube (OMMH) networks are regarded as a class of promising optical interconnection topologies. The notion of conditional diagnosability helps enhance the self-diagnosing capability of multicomputers. This paper determines the conditional diagnosabilities of OMMH networks under the Maeng-Malek comparison model. (C) 2014 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Conditional diagnosability of optical multi-mesh hypercube networks under the comparison diagnosis model
